reporter_caption.center: GRAY v. FL. UNPLMT APP COM'N, 28 So.3d 49 (Fla.App. 1 Dist. 2010)

caption.center: Gray v. Florida Unemployment Appeals Com'n.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from an order of the Unemployment Appeals Commission. Alan Orantes Forst, Chairman.
opinion.attorneys:
Scott Thomas Gray, pro se, Appellant.
M. Elaine Howard, Deputy General Counsel, Unemployment Appeals Commission, Tallahassee, for Appellees.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
KAHN, DAVIS, and THOMAS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED
